com.mesosphere.sdk.offer.evaluate.security

Class CertificateNamesGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mesosphere.sdk.offer.evaluate.security.CertificateNamesGenerator

  • public class CertificateNamesGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    A CertificateNamesGenerator creates relevant TLS certificate names for given pod instance.
